response.overview: A married workaholic, Michael Newman doesn't have time for his wife and children, not if he's to impress his ungrateful boss and earn a well-deserved promotion. So when he meets Morty, a loopy sales clerk, he gets the answer to his prayers: a magical remote that allows him to bypass life's little distractions with increasingly hysterical results.
response.tagline: What if you had a universal remote...that controlled your universe?
response.title: Click

titles.title: Cambia la tua vita con un click
